Nozawa Katsushi (see also Toyozawa Tomisuke V)

(野澤勝司)

Dates:
'1971-1984/04'

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)

Performances:

July 1973: The Twenty-Four Dutiful Sons

July 1975: The Vendetta in Iga
